Name: habitat_elev
Model: ~ lsig + Intercept + Conifer + Mixed + Wetland + Elevation

Name: habitat_elev_spat
Model: ~ lsig + Intercept + Conifer + Mixed + Wetland + Elevation + Northing + Easting

Name: habitat_spde
Model: ~ mySPDE(map = coordinates, model = matern) + lsig + Intercept + Conifer + Mixed + Wetland

Name: habitat_elev_spde
Model: ~ mySPDE(map = coordinates, model = matern) + lsig + Intercept + Conifer + Mixed + Wetland + Elevation

Name: habitat_elev_spatial_spde
Model: ~ mySPDE(map = coordinates, model = matern) + lsig + Intercept + Conifer + Mixed + Wetland + Elevation + Northing + Easting
